nodes.text: Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic

Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic is a series of animated shorts released on YouTube tied to the Star Wars: The High Republic multimedia initiative. Each episode focuses on a particular character from the project, explaining their histories and motivations prior to the events of the books and comics. The series was produced by Eastham Studios. Some episodes of the series are featured as segments within the Star Wars: The High Republic Show.
